concept.title: Console - Monitor Mode
concept.shortdesc: In Monitor mode, you can use the console to view data as it passes through the pipeline.

conbody.p: The following image shows the console in Monitor mode:

strow.stentry: Displays the pipeline that the is running. You can click a stage to view statistics about the stage. Click an unused section of the canvas to view pipeline statistics.

Displays statistics for the pipeline or selected stage. Can display information about the pipeline or configuration details.
Allows configuration of metric and data alerts. Can display the pipeline history and summary information for each run of the pipeline.
Lists the stages in the pipeline. Use to select the information that you want to view.
Select to create a data rule or alert.

Indicates when alerts are configured on the stream:
Gray indicates no data alerts are activated.
Green indicates at least one data alert is activated.
Red indicates an alert has been triggered.
Captures a snapshot of data passing through the pipeline so you can review the data, like data preview.
Indicates an alert has been triggered.
